name: Dungeon Cleanup Crew
description:
The game was made for the gogodotjam with the theme "Growth". 

You are a slime tasked to clean up a dungeon after adventurers have raided it. This may seem like a mundane task, but adventurers are really creative with hiding trash!

Controls: 

Move: WASD

Move camera: Arrow keys

Pause: ESC

Reset: R
